Definition: MPG (Miles Per Gallon) is the amount of fuel consumed by the particular vehicle of an instance
This attribute describes the number of cylinders of each car
This is another attibute of the vehicle which has a quantitative continous value describing the engine displacement
This attribute tells about the horsepower of a car and is a continous valued variable
This refers to the weight of each car which is a continous valued quantitative variable
The year the model was released is mentioned in this attribute
1 refers to cars made in USA 2 for Europe and 3 for Asia
